EmailTemplate.name: 201802_GLOBAL_HAT_737 NG Dismantle_Irina.201802_GLOBAL_HAT_737 NG Dismantle_Irin
EmailTemplate.subject: HAT Increases Support for B737NG Operators
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Dear Customers, Honeywell Aerospace Trading (HAT) continues to expand its inventory of B737NG Used Serviceable Material for products manufactured by Honeywell and other OEMs in order to support its customer base. HAT recently acquired all of the airframe component inventory from B737-600 aircraft MSN 28300. The airframe components will be re-certified and available for sale or exchange from the Honeywell Distribution Center in the United Kingdom.
Some of the parts that will be available are:
This strategic acquisition follows prior B737NG, A320 and B777 inventory investments from airframes in 2017, enabling HAT to provide complete inventory support for products from Honeywell and other OEMs to its customers.
HAT is a growing provider of Used Serviceable Material to aircraft operators world-wide, having a global sales force.
FOR QUOTES AND ORDERS, PLEASE CLICK HERE <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/HAT_B737_2018.html]]>
